title: Element 2 Quiz - Provide Technical Advice
description: Test your knowledge of providing effective technical advice and support to clients.

questions.text: Before implementing a solution, what must you obtain from the client?
When working with non-technical clients, you should avoid using technical ___ and instead use ___ they can understand.
What does SLA stand for in the context of vendor support?
What are the TWO main types of technical support?
You should always ___ the level of support agreed upon with the client.
What should you provide to clients along with technical support?

answers.text: Access to your personal phone number

questions.text: Explain how you would adjust your communication style when providing technical advice to a client with limited technical knowledge versus a highly technical client. Provide specific examples. (4-5 sentences)
Why is it important to investigate and document the amount of technical support a client may require? What factors would you consider? (3-4 sentences)
